com.simplegeo.client.encoder
Class GeoJSONEncoder

java.lang.Object
  com.simplegeo.client.encoder.GeoJSONEncoder

public class GeoJSONEncoder
extends java.lang.Object

Encodes and decodes JSONObject into IRecords.

Author:
Derek Smith

Constructor Detail

GeoJSONEncoder

public GeoJSONEncoder()
Method Detail

getRecord

public static DefaultRecord getRecord(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
Converts a JSONObject into a DefaultRecord. If a parse exception is thrown, the return value will be null.

Parameters:
jsonObject - the JSONObject to convert
Returns:
a newly constructed DefaultRecord

getRecords

public static java.util.List<DefaultRecord> getRecords(GeoJSONObject geoJSONObject)
Converts a GeoJSONObject into an Array of DefaultRecord. If a parse exception is thrown, the return value will be null. An array is returned instead of a single object due to the fact that a single GeoJSON object has the capacity to maintain a collection.

Parameters:
geoJSONObject - the GeoJSONObject to convert
Returns:
a newly constructed list of DefaultRecord

getGeoJSONRecord

public static GeoJSONRecord getGeoJSONRecord(IRecord record)
Converts a IRecord into a GeoJSONObject. If a parse exception is thrown, the return value will be null.

Parameters:
record - the IRecord to convert
Returns:
a newly constructed GeoJSONObject

getGeoJSONRecord

public static GeoJSONObject getGeoJSONRecord(java.util.List<IRecord> records)
See Also:
getGeoJSONRecord(com.simplegeo.client.model.IRecord)
